Package interfaces

Interface FridgeControllerI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentServiceI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FridgeConnector, FridgeControllerOutboundPort
    public interface FridgeControllerI
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredI
    The interface FridgeControllerI defines the interface required by a component that needs to get information from a fridge component.
